attributes.additional_details:
It is not fair on the tax payer to fund the lunacy of the welsh government 
When it is deliberately wasting its money .
The 20 mphwill cost the economy billions 
The extension will cost the taxpayers for no reason millions 
The universal income millions 
Drakeford should be held responsible for his spending of taxpayers money
attributes.background:
The 20mph in wales is forecast to cost the economy between £3 to £4 billion 
He is expanding the Senedd by 90 more AMs 
For no reason 
A universal income £1600 a month for everyone in wales 
Without the funding

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
